[[2009 NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Tournament|2009 NCAA Tournament]] 9 Seed (South) |BowlTourney=First Round vs. LSU |BowlTourneyResult=L 75â71 }} {{2008â09 Horizon League men's basketball standings}} The '''2008â09 Butler Bulldogs men's basketball team''' represented the [[Butler Bulldogs men's basketball]] team in the [[2008â09 NCAA Division I men's basketball season]]. Their head coach was [[Brad Stevens]], serving his 2nd year. The Bulldogs played their home games at the [[Hinkle Fieldhouse]], which has a capacity of approximately 10,000.[http://www.butlersports.com/information/facilities/hinkle_fieldhouse Butler University â The Official Athletics Site: Hinkle Fieldhouse], retrieved 21 December 2009 The Bulldogs won the 2009 Horizon League Men's Basketball Regular Season Championship and received an at-large bid to the [[2009 NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Tournament]], earning a 9 seed in the South Region. They fell to 8 seed [[LSU Tigers men's basketball|LSU]] . ==Roster== {{CBB roster/Header|year=2009|team=Butler Bulldogs|teamcolors=y|high_school=y}} {{CBB roster/Player|first=Alex |last=Anglin |num=11
